D i s t r i b u t i o n: Known from all zoogeographical regions. In the Malagasy subregion recorded from Seychelles (Inner Seychelles , Coetivy), Madagascar , Réunion , Mauritius and Rodrigues .

The cosmopolitan species
Evania appendigaster
is an important control agent of the American cockroach, Periplaneta americana (LINNAEUS 1758), which is a nasty household pest in tropical and subtropical areas. Other hosts in the Mascarene islands could be Periplaneta australasiae (FABRICIUS 1775) and Rhyparobia maderae (FABRICIUS 1781). MOUTIA & MAMET (1947) erroneously recorded spiders as hosts.
